column4: I'm having problems with enabling DMA on the DVD writer I just installed. I can't find the right /dev/foo device. Can anyone help?
it said that dma is disabled
the dvd player is working fine
but I can't get it to use DMA
how can I tell which is the currrent device?
OK I'll check them both out
and lsuactiafner ok I'll edit my hdparm.conf now with that
